title: The Gandhi Story
description:
[IMG]http://img166.imageshack.us/img166/135/h33tpresentsss3.gif[/IMG]

The Gandhi Story
[IMG]http://img301.imageshack.us/img301/6313/thegsoh1.jpg[/IMG]

This pictorial representation of The Gandhi  Story must appeal to children in India.  The Gandhi Story has become an essential part of our rich heritage in the past and is still moulding our present.  I am sure that generations to come will wonder at this great story.  It is well, therefore, our children should get acquainted with it before they read more about it in books. 

BIG THANKS to all the scanners involved.

IF YOU LIKE THE BOOK, THEN BUY THE COMICS OR THE TRADES. SUPPORT YOUR LOCAL COMIC BOOK STORES AND THE INDEPENDENT PUBLISHERS!!!

Please keep seeding and enjoy! :D
